source.7122c87c: Hi! I want to share with you same small datasaving tricks. I suppose it could help somebody 1. When generating of new features takes a lot of time you can save results in additional kernel and use it in your main kernel. It will help you save a lot of time when you reopen your kernel or something goes wrong. You just need add new dataset in the kernel interface And write new ways to your data. Notice, the path to primary data will be changed
